title: Format
description: Represents a creative format with its requirements

type.description: Media type of this format - determines rendering method and asset requirements

is_standard.description: Whether this format follows IAB specifications or AdCP standard format definitions (found in /schemas/v1/standard-formats/)

requirements.description: Technical specifications for this format (e.g., dimensions, duration, file size limits, codecs)

assets_required.description: Array of required assets for this format

optional_assets.description: Array of optional assets that may be included

delivery.description: Delivery method specifications (e.g., hosted, VAST, third-party tags)

accepts_3p_tags.description: Whether this format can accept third-party served creative tags as an alternative to hosted assets
